program main
    implicit none
    integer :: n, i, j, ans, ansprice, score, len_s, len_str, c_code
    character(len=20) :: s, input_str, result
    integer, dimension(:,:), allocatable :: vec
    integer :: fl

    ! Read input for first program
    read(*,*) n
    allocate(vec(n,4))
    do i = 1, n
        read(*,*) vec(i,1), vec(i,2), vec(i,3), vec(i,4)
    end do

    ! Process first part
    ans = 500
    ansprice = 20000
    do i = 1, n
        fl = 1
        do j = 1, n
            if (vec(i,1) < vec(j,1) .and. vec(i,2) < vec(j,2) .and. vec(i,3) < vec(j,3)) then
                fl = 0
                exit
            end if
        end do
        if (fl == 1) then
            if (vec(i,4) < ansprice) then
                ansprice = vec(i,4)
                ans = i
            end if
        end if
    end do

    ! Convert ans to string s
    write(s, '(i0)') ans
    s = adjustl(s)

    ! Process second part
    score = 0
    len_s = len_trim(s)
    do i = 1, len_s
        character(len=1) :: my_char, his_char
        if (mod(i-1, 2) == 0) then
            my_char = 'g'
        else
            my_char = 'p'
        end if
        his_char = s(i:i)
        if (my_char /= his_char) then
            if (my_char == 'p') then
                score = score + 1
            else
                score = score - 1
            end if
        end if
    end do

    ! Convert score to input_str
    write(input_str, '(i0)') score
    input_str = adjustl(input_str)

    ! Process third part
    len_str = len_trim(input_str)
    integer, dimension(0:255) :: counts = 0
    do i = 1, len_str
        character(len=1) :: c = input_str(i:i)
        c_code = ichar(c)
        counts(c_code) = counts(c_code) + 1
    end do

    integer :: num_unique = 0
    logical :: valid = .true.
    do i = 0, 255
        if (counts(i) > 0) then
            num_unique = num_unique + 1
            if (counts(i) /= 2) then
                valid = .false.
            end if
        end if
    end do

    if (num_unique == 2 .and. valid) then
        result = 'Yes'
    else
        result = 'No'
    end if

    ! Output the result
    print*, trim(result)

    deallocate(vec)
end program main
